about_the_game:
Wild West
Welcome to the Wild West where steampunk meets magic, also, human races are living next to fantasy creatures. The protagonist is a young vampire Maria El Chupacabra decides to become a bounty hunter!
But Maria isn't a super hero and few precise shots can take her down easily.

Steampunk Arsenal
Use various types of guns and traps to take your opponents down, some weapons can be used as a tool.

Magic
Support your action with magic, increasing your strength or casting curses on the enemy.
There are some magic items and spells that can bring chaos to your opponents.

Use Opponents
The protagonist has the power to take control of one opponent for some time.
Each opponent has his strength and weaknesses strong ogres can push heavy objects whereas elves run fast and jump high, using that against them or solving a puzzle to get extra stuff.

Planning
During the game, you can find traps like bear traps or exploding barrels, put them in the right place, alert opponents and see how the traps are doing the rest of the job.
But sometimes you have to avoid fighting for example blocking enemy wasy or sneak behind their back.
